availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Nancy Mangum Edwards in Orange County, North Carolina, in September 1830. Father of Hinton Edwards, William Edwards, Harvey Edwards, and Simeon Edwards. Farmer in Webster County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 615.
North Carolina Marriage Bonds - Abstracts 1760 - 1957, North Carolina State Archives, Raleigh, NC, RG 048, Orange County.
